data.Sentence_cn: 昨天下午弗兰克.霍金斯向我讲述了他年轻时的经历。
data.Sentence: Yesterday afternoon Frank Hawkins was telling me about his experiences as a young man.

data.Sentence_cn: 在退休前，弗兰克是一家非常大的商业公司的经理，但他小时候却在一家小铺里做工。
data.Sentence: Before he retired, Frank was the head of a very large business company, but as a boy he used to work in a small shop.

data.Sentence_cn: 他那时的工作是修理自行车，并且通常是一天工作14个小时。
data.Sentence: It was his job to repair bicycles and at that time he used to work fourteen hours a day.

data.Sentence_cn: 他靠多年积蓄，于1958年买下了自己的一个小铺子。
data.Sentence: He saved money for years and in 1958 he bought a small workshop of his own.

data.Sentence_cn: 20多岁的时候，弗兰克曾生产飞机零配件。
data.Sentence: In his twenties Frank used to make spare parts for aeroplanes.
At that time he had two helpers.

data.Sentence_cn: 几年之后，小铺子已经发展成了一个雇有728人的大工厂。
data.Sentence: In a few years the small workshop had become a large factory which employed seven hundred and twenty-eight people.

data.Sentence_cn: 弗兰克回想着他早年的艰难经历和走过的漫长的成功之路，微笑了。
data.Sentence: Frank smiled when he remembered his hard early years and the long road to success.

data.Sentence_cn: 他正笑着的时候门开了，他的妻子走了进来。
data.Sentence: He was still smiling when the door opened and his wife came in.

data.Sentence_cn: 她叫他去修理孙子的自行车。
data.Sentence: She wanted him to repair their grandson's bicycle!
